Reviews.Title: You can't go wrong with LN32C550. One of the best 32" 1080p 60Hz HDTV out there.
Reviews.Author: Nadeem
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV after reading alot of reviews and a few visits to store to compare different 32" size TVs offered by Sony, Samsung, LG and Panasonic. This was among the best and top of the line Samsung 'LCD' 1080p HDTV model in 32 inch series. Finally I narrowed down my search to Sony's Bravia 32" KDL32EX400 and Samsung's LNC530 and LNC550.All 3 HDTVs have a lot of things in common like 1080p res, 60Hz refresh rate, CCFL LCD Panel, HDMI/USB ports, Picture-in-Picture support etc, but there are also some diffs among these three. Samsung LNC550 stood out from the former (Sony KDL32EX400) in the following features.--USB Media Player. The USB Media Player on Samsung is way ahead than any of its competitors. This things plays a wide variety of video/audio codecs (avi,mkv,mp4,H264,DivX, Xvid,MPEG1,MPEG2). You name it and they have it. It also supports the 5.1 audio (DTS Core, A52/AC3) and subtitle (.srt) files. Ofcourse, USB Media player functions faster and easily when u browse media using USB Hard Drive.--DLNA 'All Share' Network Streaming. This is something really important for me in a TV since I have most of my media files on PC. The same USB Media Player in this TV also plays 'flawlessly' a number of audio/video (720p HD) streams directly from your PC. All you need is, connect your TV to your Wireless router (wired connection) and then share your media files via the home WiFi network. You can use either Samsung's PC Share Manager software or Windows 7 Media Player to share your PC media contents. (Both LNC530 and KDL32EX400 lack this)--Supports an affordable Samsung LinkStick Wireless adapter which connects your TV to broadband router wirelessly.--Connectivity Options (2 USB 2.0 ports, since more USB ports means you can connect more USB devices)--Intuitive Samsungs Remote controls--Intuitive OnScreen Menu Navigation--Easy to reach touch buttons on front panel.--Better Quality and material used in frame.--Aesthetic, Clean Design and Looks.

Reviews.Title: First HDTV
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I knew I wanted a samsung HDTV because I have heard great things from friends who know more about technology than I do. I have not been disappointed in the least with my purchase. The tv has great sound and picture quality both in dark/dim lighting as well as in a sun drenched room. The tv is in a bedroom which it is a perfect size for. It was easy set up, I did it alone. The box does say to have two people work on it but definitely possible to do alone if no one is around and you are impatient. For set up you will need a Phillips head screw driver. The only downside which has nothing to do with the tv directly was that fedex left the package on my front stoop when I was not home and it comes in a factory box with a picture of the tv on the box, just something to be cautious of if you order this product.

Reviews.Title: Quit working
Reviews.Author: Calvin Clift
Reviews.Content: The TV was great while it worked.  However it went to "black" the first week and we called Samsung, who had us UPS the new TV to them for repair.  I spent a lot of money on a TV to not be able to watch it! We did get the TV back from Samsung, and it now works fine.  I am suspicious that it is a "refurbished" unit as the TV had a "R" behind the serial number when I bought it from Amazon and I could not take it to a local shop, but had to mail it back to Samsung.  At any rate I am happy with it as it is now.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, a Bit Complex Though
Reviews.Author: C. Blenk "oneweb"
Reviews.Content: This was my first adventure into HDTV and LCD TV's, but I'm a technology buff, so advanced tech doesn't scare me (I actually enjoy it).  My first impressions with this TV were the great resolution while watching Blu-ray movies (what I really think these screens are good for) and that the comments about HD shows and their "flawed" personalities was right on (ha!)  I've connected the TV to a cable box and Sony Blue Ray player - so now I have three big remotes that all do different things.  I'm considering a universal remote to solve this problem.  I don't understand why the TV plays a tune when turning on and off and I can't find in the manual how to stop this from happening.  The internet options look interesting, though I've only tried YouTube so far.  YouTube videos play, but they look really poor because of the compression put on them and they don't have the same controls that are available on the web site.  Standard cable TV doesn't look very good either because of the quality of the signal.  Those old channels were much clearer on my old "tube" TV than with this new one.  I mostly stay in the HD channels because of it.  Most of these complaints have nothing to do with the Samsung TV and that's why I gave it 5 stars anyway.  I just want any new HDTV folks to not be surprised by the quality of standard programming.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Zack J
Reviews.Content: I am nothing but pleased with this TV.  It's sharp, clear, bright, and really good looking to boot.I have it hooked up to a Mac Mini and setup and connection between the two was very easy.This TV was listed locally for $650.  The Amazon.com sale price ($499) could not be beat at the time.I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: The wrong green
Reviews.Author: R. H. Nichols
Reviews.Content: I heard of going green, but I didn't want my picture to be green. I had this set with the green shades and talked to Samsung they said to send it to NJ to be fixed, came back the same way, I don't think theyt did anything. Emailed Vann's they said send it back and they sent me another new set. At first it seemed OK, but the picture just keeps getting greener and greener, especially the shaadows. I called Samsung about this new set, they said something is wrong inside send it to NJ to be repaired. Well I've been through that, I guess I'm just stuck with a bad TV, Samsung will never sell me another.

Reviews.Title: Good one
Reviews.Author: V. Kanamatareddy "Vijay Reddy"
Reviews.Content: I got this TV on June 3rd 2010. Easy to install. Its working very well as of today. HD picture quality is amazing. Sound is not bad. I play movies and videos from my external hard drive(using usb 2.0). Its user friendly. On a whole, its a nice TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Limited WiFi
Reviews.Author: Right Angle "Average Reader"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the picture.However the WiFi feature is limited, and it requires separate purchase of a Lan Adapter.I thought I would be able to stream movies from companies like Netflix.Not available. The only WiFi capability is to access photos and videos on your computer.There is also an Allshare feature that allows communication from your phone.I finally purchased a Sony Blu-Ray DVD BDP-S570 player that comes with WiFi built in. The Sony allows me to stream movies from various sources including Netflix. And it also allows access to photos and movies stored on my computer. So Paying extra for the WiFi feature on the Samsung TV is a waste of money unless you want the Allshare feature, which I don't understand how to use, or why I would want to use it.Needless to say, the manual is not much help in understanding the set-up, or explanation of the Allshare feature. I finally had to call Samsung support to get a confirmation that there is no way to stream movies from the internet.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for my Master Bedroom
Reviews.Author: TechDiva
Reviews.Content: Great LCD for a midsized room.  The menu settings and remote take a bit of getting used to, but it is not a deal breaker.  The picture is very clear, vibrant with crisp color and black "blacks".  I can hardly tell when I'm watching one of Time Warner Cable's "regular" or "HD" stations.  The aesthetics of the TV itself is very nice.  I didn't think I'd care for the red line around the bezel but it is not so noticeable and won't clash with your room colors.  The line is not bold so it disappears after awhile.I can't comment much about viewing this at an angle.  I have it in an armoire so it is position only for direct viewing.  It looks like it handles angle viewing well when I'm walking by or entering the room.I'm usually a Panasonic die-hard fan when it comes to TVs.  Space requirements forced me to Samsung.  However, I am pleasantly surprised and happy with this purchase so far. I have been using this for a couple of months now.  The proof will come over time.  All of my previous Panny's were all quality workhorses.  As my first Samsung purchase I hope this will be a similar experience.

Reviews.Title: Takes study and getting used to
Reviews.Author: Robert F. Leroux "Handmade-Buy"
Reviews.Content: After two weeks:  We are on a cable box so the instruction manual to accommodate same isn't easy to follow unless you have a teenager who can breeze through such things!Setting up the connections is very simple and intuitive.  BUT had a tough time getting the closed captions to appear and I'm still wondering why some of them are missing when the character is speaking and it is not just because there is a lag.Adjusting the picture is ongoing for me because I'm not happy with the preponderance of darkness in some of the pictures.The picture is crisp but when a pan takes place the edges blur a bit.Would I send it back?  NO!  Compared to the 15 year old 27" Panasonic it replaced (for the same price I paid in 1995!) I am happy to have such a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Supports lots of video formats on its usb functionality!
Reviews.Author: Rea
Reviews.Content: this is my 2nd samsung lcd (1st was 32b530), and the usb functionality is a great improvement.this model can play lots of video format- avi- mkv- asf- mp4- 3gp- etc..my unit was also dead on arrival, that's why im giving this a 4 star. tv would not turn on. no power. no lights on the power led. amazon replaced the unit and the replacement was perfect. i guess this is not a problem with amazon since the product was still factory sealed.nice aesthetics. picture and color was great. perfect for my ps3 gaming and bluray watching.watch out for defects, other than that, this is a great hdtv!

Reviews.Title: Horrible customer service for under warranty repairs
Reviews.Author: Virginia Young "Cricket_ G"
Reviews.Content: Worked for 8 months perfectly. Now we have a serious aliasing (red and blue in the picture) issue.While it is still under warranty, Samsung requires you to ship all TVs 32" and under to them for repair. This means to get my TV fixed I have to now pay for a box, packing materials, AND shipping to their repair center in NJ. For a 32" TV, this is no small cost. I expect better customer service for TVs costing over $500.If I had known to get it repaired under warranty we'd have to ship it back to Samsung, we would have never followed Consumer Reports suggestion on this purchase. Clearly, their recommendation did not take into account their customer service.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD
Reviews.Author: Ralph Rotten
Reviews.Content: At a time when it seems everything is made of plastic, this LCD is refreshing.  This LCD comes with a glass base and a glass frame around the screen; both are very attractive.  The rear cover is actually made out of metal, which complements the glass at presenting a quality construction look and feel.  This is my second Samsung LCD (the first one is 2.5 years old with no issues).  The ability to add this TV to my home network and play movies or view photos directly from my computer is a nice feature.  I've only had the LCD for a week, but am completely satisfied with every aspect of this TV.  I would recommend this LCD and Samsung products in general.

Reviews.Title: hdtv
Reviews.Author: John G. Barrett
Reviews.Content: Great hdtv. Picture quality and sound is superb. The only negative is that every now and then the picturer will "jump" and I have to reset the hdmi input. This can be annoying when it happens.Samsung LN32C450 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTV (Black)

Reviews.Title: great product and service
Reviews.Author: smith
Reviews.Content: This tv is awesome!  Don't think the touch of red color really makes a difference but I love it.  I plan on buying a larger one from amazon soon.  Amazon is great and the tv arrived like in two days. Love it!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch LCD monitor
Reviews.Author: F.N.
Reviews.Content: Received the tv a day earlier than promisedInstalled the tv in our cabinetAnd have been enjoying the near perfectCrisp and clear picture ever since.I do highly recommend this model.And the best part about the deal wasAmazon's price which was about 200.00Less rhan Bestbuy.

Reviews.Title: Very poor LED HDTV!
Reviews.Author: R. MURPHY
Reviews.Content: This TV is defective...it won't turn off, or it turns off in the middle of a program.  It is one of four Samsung TV's in my home.  I called Samsung customer service...they said the TV was out of warranty and they couldn't help with a fix. I understand it is out of warranty, but, I have many Samsung products in my home...they obviously don't recognize "customer loyalty".No more Samsung products in my household and I will share the reason why to others that ask.

Reviews.Title: Don't be deceived by the "wireless feature"
Reviews.Author: Justin Berg
Reviews.Content: The wireless adapter Samsung WIS09ABGN LinkStick Wireless LAN Adapter sold with the TV is useless if you intend to connect the TV to the Internet.  I purchased the TV thinking that I'd be able to stream movies from Netflix and Amazon by linking it up to my wireless network.  Unfortunately, the smallest Samsung TV that would let you do this is 40 inches.  The wireless network is great for sharing files between your TV and PC--- if you have a PC (and not a mac like me).  Had I realized how limited this extra feature was, I wouldn't have bought the TV.

Reviews.Title: If you want a TV for only 18 months
Reviews.Author: Romedj
Reviews.Content: If you want a TV for only 18 months then this is the one to buy. However, if you want one that will last longer then stay away. Search the Internet and you will find many proplems with this TV and other Samsung TVs showing up right after warranty runs out. Some people will mention bad capacitors problems other will mention bad power supplies. I have yet solved mine, even after buying a new power supply board. Calling Samsung is no help at all. They know of the problems with their TVs but turn a blind eye after the warranty expires. So either get an extended warranty or stay away or maybe you will be one of the lucky ones. Do not buy this or any other Samsung LCD until they solve their quality issues!!!

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Usaa "Jackie Lee, wallet specialist"
Reviews.Content: I decided on this purchase after doing some basic research on my current tv needs and I decided on this Samsung 1080p HDTV.  I am pleased with the purchase that was made considering that it is replacing an old tv we had.  I made the purchased about three weeks ago and the set-up was fairly easy.  The purchase was made to go in our bedroom.  I definitely would recommend this product.  The price was right considering the price at other stores to be much higher.

Reviews.Title: very nice tv, but watch out for defects
Reviews.Author: M. Wilcox
Reviews.Content: The first one of these I received was dead on arrival - it simply wouldn't turn on. The standby power light didn't even come on when it was plugged in. A call to Samsung confirmed it was defective.Amazon was great about picking it up and sending a replacement for Saturday delivery, but it was still extremely disappointing.The replacement set works great. Beautiful, bright picture with a good viewing angle and decent sound. I recommend it, if you don't mind rolling the dice on getting a defective set.

Reviews.Title: DLNA is useless
Reviews.Author: Ryan C Sanders
Reviews.Content: The tv will not play videos longer than 1:25:35 through any DLNA server.  Samsung says the tv was not designed to plan full movies only home clips.

Reviews.Title: Samsung should have recalled this model due to manufacturing defects but didn't
Reviews.Author: ZHIYONG WANG
Reviews.Content: Obviously this TV model plus many other Samsung models has been found to be have manufacturing issues and Samsung got into lawsuit with it, mine was working fine until recently as it began to turn itself on and off or increase volume by itself; I purchased it 3 years ago and my warranty has expired, unfortunately I only knew that my model was among those models with manufacutring defects only after my problem surfaced recently. After reading some online reviews, I decided to upgrade the firmwire to a new version which was successful, hoping that it could do the trick; however, after upgrading the firmwave, the TV began to change channels by itself instead of changing volume by itself.  What is most frustrating to me is  "where was the recall on this if Samsung knew this model was having issues?"  I would imagine that there are other customers in my similar situation feeling totally played by Samsung

Reviews.Title: Good TV, but......
Reviews.Author: Donald J. Latimer
Reviews.Content: I have had this monitor/TV for 10 months and it has worked well.  I use it for both ways with HDMI and get a good image.  But it had a small white dot on the screen and had to return/replace it.  Otherwise no problems.

Reviews.Title: My first flat screen!
Reviews.Author: Diane Doll
Reviews.Content: This arrived so quickly as all your products do and it is a 32" screen in a very small room. Perfect size. I love everything about it...good sound, amazing picture and trouble free. I will stick with this brand if I decide on another in a different room.It had been highly recommended to me and lived up to the hype.

Reviews.Title: nice buy!
Reviews.Author: susie
Reviews.Content: 60 Hz is fine for me. Price is fair, especially when Amazon doesn't recognize your email name. Try changing your email & they will give you the most off at first.Remember, this is only for new customers. So, I am giving this trick away...hope it works for you!TV is a beauty! Why did Samsung add the annoying on/off noise is beyond me? Other than that, it has a great remote & picture. I hooked up my computer speakers to watch movies with. I use the other speakers on the TV for normal viewing.

Reviews.Title: No regrets
Reviews.Author: Yelena
Reviews.Content: I had done research for months looking for the best tv to suit my needs. After all my hard work it was such a pleasure to have been fully satisfied after it all... received the television in perfect order. Have had it for just about a year and it works perfectly to date. the colours are so vibrant. It changed my whole perception of watching television. Can't even look at television on my dad's old one any more. My sister lives in my room and has practically taken over the television. Having the ability to Connect my external hard drive or my laptop to the television is so flexible. Its easy to dismount and place on its stand if you want to temporarily move it elsewhere.Only downfall is that the power cord is a bit on the short side, specifically if you have it mounted up on your wall, but that's about it.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG LN32C550
Reviews.Author: MIC
Reviews.Content: DID A LOT OF RESEARCH ON DIFFERENT MODELS AND FELT THAT SAMSUNG WAS THE BETTER CHOICE FOR MY NEEDS. YOU MUST DO YOUR HOME WORK... THIS MODEL SEEMS TO BE WORKING NICELY.

Reviews.Title: Samsung has not disappointed yet
Reviews.Author: Average Joe
Reviews.Content: The unit complements my similar 37 inch unit.  I'm very happy with Samsung picture quality and feature set.  Like other Samsung reviews, the audio is fair.  If you use a home theater system, this becomes a non-issue.  This unit is in a master bedroom and the sound is not nearly as important as in a larger room where you may want theater sound.  So I'm content with it.  Connecting my Toshiba laptop via HDMI is all automatic and can watch my laptop videos, pictures, on-line movies/television shows, etc on the big screen.  That's awesome.  I'll continue to buy Samsung until they disappoint.

Reviews.Title: Won't be sending this one back
Reviews.Author: moring4glory
Reviews.Content: After looking at the bazzillion options for TVs out there I FINALLY settled on this one and I am not disappointed. I don't even pretend to know anything about electronics so I can only give my viewers opinion. I use this in the bedroom and it is a perfect size. The color and picture are appealing to my untrained eye, however the sound is less than desirable as I have to crank it way up, something I didn't have to do with my old dinosaur of a TV. I have found this set cheaper than Amazon else where but they offered that incredible interest free 2 year payment option and I jumped on it. All in all I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: LOVE this TV
Reviews.Author: handicapped shopper
Reviews.Content: I have 2 LCD TV's and I like this one the best, even though it's smaller than my LG.  The picture is GREAT.  The remote is GREAT.  I know it sounds funny to rate a remote, but I find that many remotes make you go through "layers" before you can locate the feature you want.  NOT this one.  Picture size, closed captioning, etc. are right on the remote for easy access. The ONLY thing I don't like is that the volume control isn't automatically adjusted when the channel changes its volume.  My LG has that feature and it's a GREAT feature.  With this TV I am always reaching for the volume control.  Other than that, I LOVE it.  I haven't tried the feature for networking it yet.  Not sure I'll know how to use that feature, but I am really looking forward to doing that.

Reviews.Title: Got it on 10/2. Haven't been able to put it together by 10/28
Reviews.Author: delrayjack
Reviews.Content: Got it on 10/2 (Saturday) and found that the holes on the plastic piece supporting the set on its stand didn't match the holes in the set.  Called Samsung 10/4 and they sent replacement, but due to their policy of 5 to 15 business days before SHIPMENT, didn't get it till 10/18.  Guess what - it was identical to the mismatched part originally sent and which appears in their manual as the 32" part.  Further study of the manual shows a part intended for a 37"-and-up set and which appears to conform to the TV set's hole alignment.  I called Samsung on 10/18 and am presently awaiting receipt of this larger part.Amazon return privileges expire on 11/1 and I haven't yet had a chance to plug the set in and see how it works.  What a boondoggle!  (I'm an engineer and used to putting complex items together.  If I can include a picture, I've photoed the set sitting on the mismatched part.)

Reviews.Title: Quit working after 18 months
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: To be fair I have the 540 model,  bought at a club store. For 18 month it worked fine, except occationally changed the channel by itself. One day it turned Off and won't turn On. Online Tech. support couldn't help. Out of warranty, out of luck.

Reviews.Title: Ok TV - nothing special.
Reviews.Author: BK BAZHE "writer, poet, & artist."
Reviews.Content: OK TV. Not very hard to install. Its working ok but nothing amazing. HD picture quality is good.Sound is not bad. On a whole, its OK second TV, basement TV, or as gift to my Cat. He mainlywatches his favorite animal planet channel in the basement; That's all;

Reviews.Title: Great TV with Samsung Apps
Reviews.Author: Long Lu "Dub"
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV over the holiday, so far I only have great things to say about this Samsung model. The 40inch looks sleek on a TV media shelf, the base was sturdy and bezel is not too big that creates a well-framed outline. Compare to a previous owned LG 42LD520 model I had, it was much brighter and almost comparable to an Edge lit LED (Vizio 420VT).Overall I was very happy with my purchase of this LN42C560 model, if have to put a con to thisis that I did had some issues with the Samsung App login but of course that its not the TV fault but rather the Samsung's website

Reviews.Title: Samsung LN32C550 HDTV
Reviews.Author: George Sword "user"
Reviews.Content: Picture quality of this set is not quite up to the other Samsung HDTV I use. I have a 32 inch LN32A550 HDTV which has much better picture quality. I am little disappointed with this Samsung set.

ProductInfo.Features:
Touch of Color? design
Full HD 1080p resolution
ConnectShare? Movie
Game Mode
Exceeds ENERGY STAR® standards
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung LN32C550 32-Inch 1080p 60 Hz LCD HDTV (Black)
